title: Establishes distinctive "Support Our Troops" number plates for motor vehicles
summary: Establishes distinctive "Support Our Troops" number plates for motor vehicles.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3484

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 25, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. SPANO, WEISENBERG, DESTITO, SCHIMMINGER, GALEF,
         COLTON, REILLY, STEVENSON, PHEFFER, J. MILLER -- Multi-Sponsored by --
         M. of A. ABBATE, CAHILL, MAGEE,  MARKEY,  McENENY  --  read  once  and
         referred to the Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing
         distinctive "Support Our Troops" plates

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 404-x to read as follows:
    3    S 404-X. DISTINCTIVE "SUPPORT OUR TROOPS" PLATES. 1. ANY PERSON RESID-
    4  ING  IN  THIS  STATE SHALL, UPON REQUEST, BE ISSUED DISTINCTIVE "SUPPORT
    5  OUR TROOPS" NUMBER PLATES OF A  DESIGN  APPROVED  BY  THE  COMMISSIONER.
    6  APPLICATION FOR SUCH PLATES SHALL BE FILED WITH THE COMMISSIONER IN SUCH
    7  FORM AND DETAIL AS THE COMMISSIONER SHALL PRESCRIBE.
    8    2.  THE  DISTINCTIVE  PLATES  ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL BE
    9  ISSUED IN THE SAME MANNER AS OTHER NUMBER PLATES  UPON  PAYMENT  OF  THE
   10  REGULAR  REGISTRATION FEE PRESCRIBED BY SECTION FOUR HUNDRED ONE OF THIS
   11  ARTICLE, PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT AN ADDITIONAL ONE-TIME  SERVICE  CHARGE
   12  OF FIFTEEN DOLLARS SHALL BE CHARGED FOR SUCH PLATES. SUCH SERVICE CHARGE
   13  SHALL  BE  DEPOSITED  PURSUANT TO THE PROVISIONS OF SECTION FOUR HUNDRED
   14  FOUR-OO OF THIS ARTICLE, TO THE CREDIT OF THE  DEPARTMENT'S  DISTINCTIVE
   15  PLATE DEVELOPMENT FUND ESTABLISHED BY SECTION NINETY-FIVE-G OF THE STATE
   16  FINANCE  LAW,  AND SHALL BE USED FOR THE PRODUCTION, DESIGN, ADVERTISING
   17  AND MARKETING OF DISTINCTIVE NUMBER PLATES PURSUANT TO SUCH SECTION.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   19  it shall have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07819-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive "Support Our Troops" plates
